column2: Individual Government Data File Record Layout

The individual government data file (yyempst.dat for sample years; yycempst.dat for Census years) is comprised of 84-character data records. All payroll and part-time hours in the data file are 31-day monthly equivalent values for the month of March. The first 14 characters comprise the U.S. Census Bureau identification number.

column1:
Type of government code

0 = state
1 = county
2 = municipal
3 = township
4 = special district
5 = school district
6 = Federal Government
